bioframe.name: Bioframe
bioframe.desc: Organic frame for growing Hive ships.

living_armor.name: Living Armor
living_armor.desc: Scale-like armor that can rapidly regenerate itself.

mining_organ.name: Mining Organ
mining_organ.desc: Functions as a mining laser and boosts harvesting of all tile resources. Useless for combat.

bioframe_vat.name: Bioframe Vat
bioframe_vat.desc:
Large pod for growing pieces of bioframe.
Converts 6 food, 4 water, 2 ore, 4 liquor to 1 jello and 3 bioframe per use.

living_armor_vat.name: Living Armor Vat
living_armor_vat.desc: Converts 2 bioframe, 1 metals, 3 jello, 6 water to 1 living armor per tick.

jello_breeder.name: Jello Breeder
jello_breeder.desc:
Multiplies jello at great cost.
Converts 3 food, 6 water to 3 jello per use.

jello_grower.name: Jello Grower
jello_grower.desc: Converts 5 food, 9 water, 2 exotic matter to 12 jello per tick.

homeworld_return_device.name: Homeworld Return Device
homeworld_return_device.desc: Allows returning to the hive homeworld. Cooldown: 6 hours.

homeworld_return_device2.name: Homeworld Return Device 2
homeworld_return_device2.desc: Allows returning to the hive homeworld. Charges: 2. Cooldown: 6 hours.

chitin_armor.name: Chitin Armor
chitin_armor.desc: A biological armor that regenerates over time.

scale_armor.name: Scale Armor
scale_armor.desc: A biological armor that regenerates over time.

shell_armor.name: Shell Armor
shell_armor.desc: A biological armor that regenerates over time.
